rev.comment: /* United Kingdom */ word usage error hanged not hung
rev.diff:
Line 79: Line 79:
As of the [[Criminal Justice and Immigration Act 2008]], it is also illegal to possess physical depictions of necrophilia, electronic or otherwise. Necrophilia-pornography falls under the governmental description of [[extreme pornography]], of which, possession is classed as illegal under the aforementioned act.
As of the [[Criminal Justice and Immigration Act 2008]], it is also illegal to possess physical depictions of necrophilia, electronic or otherwise. Necrophilia-pornography falls under the governmental description of [[extreme pornography]], of which, possession is classed as illegal under the aforementioned act.
â
The notorious necrophiliac [[John Reginald Christie]] was hung in 1953. He had strangled his numerous victims, and was also a [[serial killer]].
+
The notorious necrophiliac [[John Reginald Christie]] was hanged in 1953. He had strangled his numerous victims, and was also a [[serial killer]].
